definition: variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
erhua variant of 一個勁|一个劲[yi1 ge4 jin4]
to dash/to put on a spurt/to redouble efforts
erhua variant of 加勁|加劲[jia1 jin4]
erhua variant of 不對勁|不对劲[bu4 dui4 jin4]
erhua variant of 使勁|使劲[shi3 jin4]
erhua variant of 可勁|可劲[ke3 jin4]
erhua variant of 對勁|对劲[dui4 jin4]
erhua variant of 死勁|死劲[si3 jin4]
erhua variant of 沒勁|没劲[mei2 jin4]
erhua variant of 犟勁|犟劲[jiang4 jin4]
erhua variant of 省勁|省劲[sheng3 jin4]

sentences.english: Some 28 percent of adolescents say they are too tired to exercise, due to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 28%的年轻人表示，由于睡眠不足而没劲儿运动。

sentences.english: His mouth continued to twitch unspeaking in nervous curls of disdain.
sentences.chinese: 嘴唇却一个劲儿地抽搐着，显示出神经质的嘲讽。

sentences.english: That youngster works with a will.
sentences.chinese: 这小伙子干活有股傻劲儿。

sentences.english: The mallards seemed like the colder it was the better in the pond.
sentences.chinese: 池中野鸭是愈冷愈游得起劲儿。

sentences.english: This hoe suits me very well .
sentences.chinese: 这把锄我使着很对劲儿。

sentences.english: They have been getting along quite well.
He squeezed his nose, closed his mouth, and blew really hard.
sentences.chinese: 他挤挤鼻子，合上嘴，并且使劲儿吹。

sentences.english: That young girl Hun however don't feel, waving hand of a strength son.
sentences.chinese: 那少女浑然未觉，一个劲儿的挥手。

sentences.english: This is the novel to the all-pervasive fine Jiner.
sentences.chinese: 小说要的就是这种无孔不入的细劲儿。
这时，有人使劲儿把我摇醒。

sentences.english: It’s not just all the craziness in the Middle East.
sentences.chinese: 这股疯狂劲儿可不只存在于中东。

sentences.english: Jolly him up and get the job done.
sentences.chinese: 给他鼓鼓劲儿，把工作做完。

sentences.english: Alice said to herself, as well as she could for sneezing.
sentences.chinese: 爱丽丝费劲儿地对自己说，并不停地打着喷嚏。

sentences.english: I like your down-to-earth and hardworking spirit.
sentences.chinese: 我就喜欢你们这股扎扎实实埋头苦干的劲儿。

sentences.english: He heard it numbly, a little amazed at his audacity.
sentences.chinese: 他自己也听得一呆，对自己的莽撞劲儿有点吃惊。

definition: to dash/to put on a spurt/to redouble efforts
thoughts/what one has in one's heart
erhua variant of 使勁|使劲[shi3 jin4]
erhua variant of 死勁|死劲[si3 jin4]
to put effort into sth/to try really hard
